All of them scramble to work with them -- and cause pure chaos while being distracted by the fine ladies. Now he lives with his rich wife in her castle - and is bored almost to death. He fights with the butler, because he isn't even allowed to do the simple works. But when one of the clique suffers from amnesia after an accident, all of the others reunite and kidnap him, to take him on a tour to their old working places and through their memories. Some Japanese business guys, after dinner with a lot of alcohol, order 5,000 pieces. His only problem: His production capacity is way to small so he gets to produce the machines in his private house. His wife Bernadette is far from being happy about it. The children of Harpagon, Cléante and his sister Elise, are each in love but they still haven't spoken to their father yet. Harpagon is a miser who wants to choose the right man and the right woman for his children. When Cléante, at last, tries to speak to Harpagon, the old man informs the family that he wants to marry Marianne, the young girl loved by Cléante. Unaware of his son's sorrow, Harpagon doesn't understand why Cléante has become so angry with him.","poster_path":"/mwL2uf15AxzGaLAh91ZUS04weoK.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":15.4,"release_date":"1980-03-05","video":false,"vote_average":6.377,"vote_count":415},{"backdrop_path":"/ueiwD47vYmmA0Wz9Hb6BIGdkSqs.jpg","id":761,"title":"The Wing or the Thigh?","original_title":"L'Aile ou la Cuisse","overview":"Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast food entrepreneur Tri- catel to save the French art of cooking. After having agreed to appear on a talk show to show his skills in naming food and wine by taste, he is confronted with two disasters: his son wants to become a clown rather than a restaurant tester and he, the famous Charles Duchemin, has lost his taste!","poster_path":"/ywkIu5l3iAgPZvLFEVBDYxLouH8.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":23.26,"release_date":"1976-10-27","video":false,"vote_average":7.228,"vote_count":835},{"backdrop_path":"/qHngq19JZUGUcqbE30cQ83eO7iy.jpg","id":760,"title":"The Mad Adventures of Rabbi Jacob","original_title":"Les Aventures de Rabbi Jacob","overview":"In this riot of frantic disguises and mistaken identities, Victor Pivert, a blustering, bigoted French factory owner, finds himself taken hostage by Slimane, an Arab rebel leader. The two dress up as rabbis as they try to elude not only assasins from Slimane's country, but also the police, who think Pivert is a murderer. Pivert ends up posing as Rabbi Jacob, a beloved figure who's returned to France for his first visit after 30 years in the United States. Adding to the confusion are Pivert's dentist-wife, who thinks her husband is leaving her for another woman, their daughter, who's about to get married, and a Parisian neighborhood filled with people eager to celebrate the return of Rabbi Jacob.","poster_path":"/oYuCFxS2BGCHNGuv9No0GoP2DZf.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":25.945,"release_date":"1973-10-17","video":false,"vote_average":7.391,"vote_count":946},{"backdrop_path":"/nu6HNtFwcZnTfDEkdiVKhSRbshj.jpg","id":4729,"title":"The Gendarme Gets Married","original_title":"Le Gendarme se marie","overview":"The Saint-Tropez police launch a major offensive against dangerous drivers. Marechal Cruchot (Louis de Funès) relishes the assignment, which he pursues with a manic zeal. Cruchot is after an offending driver, who turns out to be Josépha (Claude Gensac), the widow of a highly regarded police colonel. When they meet, Cruchot falls instantly in love....","poster_path":"/5BeNjeTdQfWNxLiJGHFNlE8LQNh.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":16.303,"release_date":"1968-10-30","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":538},{"backdrop_path":"/xbYEbvcUAMJR0uPb4t7oGx7IzPo.jpg","id":56501,"title":"From Hong Kong with Love","original_title":"Bons baisers de Hong Kong","overview":"Bons baisers de Hong Kong (From Hong Kong with Love) is a 1975 French film directed by Yvan Chiffre. In exchange, Philippe’s host, a wealthy whisky distiller, Mac Farrel, will send his daughter, Shirley, to live with the Bosquiers in France. However, Philippe has already decided to spend the summer holidays on a yacht with his friends, so he sends a fellow student, Michonnet, to England in his place.
